Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's an exceptional item that has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. I believe it would greatly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its high value and quality, I'm offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12000. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
